ComicInfo.Penciller: Ogden Whitney,Tom Hickey,Dick Beck,Mike Suchorsky,Ogden Whitney,Tom Hickey,Dick Beck,Mike Suchorsky
ComicInfo.Title: Home Is Where You Find It!; Over the Line!; The Disappearance!; A Boy's Best Friend!; The Old Roman Coin!
ComicInfo.Summary: Ralph Benton is guided by Professor Dalton to the realization that whatever we know in life has existed before, and in doing so proves that Ralph's girl Kathie was telling the truth all along.
ComicInfo.AgeRating: Approved by the Comics Code Authority
